description_for_human: Full-stack software development company specializing in web, mobile, backend, SEO, infrastructure modernization, and technical consultation services.
description_for_model: TOP Development LLC is a software development company based in Pittsburgh, PA. They offer web development (React, React Native), mobile development (iOS, Android, cross-platform), backend development (Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, microservices), SEO services, infrastructure modernization (AWS, DevOps, CI/CD), and consultation services. Contact them at austinalex@thatoneprogrammer.dev.
